Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION [Business_day_number](@IN_DATE DATETIME, @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT VALUE = CASE WHEN @IN_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT DAY_NUMBER FROM [innovator].[BUSINESS_CALENDAR] WHERE DAY_DATE = (SELECT value FROM [innovator].[ConvertToLocal_Table]((SELECT VALUE FROM [innovator].[Roundtomidnight](@IN_DATE, @TZ_NAME)), @TZ_NAME))) END
Item.name: Business_Day_Number
